blogPost.excerpt: Keeping up with Slack channels demands your attention and time! Let Grok do the comprehending with the power of GPT-3. Summarize any Slack Channel on-demand, in a daily digest, or when joining a channel.
blogPost.body: Keeping up with Slack channels demands your attention and time! Let Grok do the comprehending with the power of GPT-3. Summarize any Slack Channel on-demand, in a daily digest, or when joining a channel.
blogPost.title: Grok - Summarize Slack channels w/ GPT3
blogPost.author: Tristan Pollock

localize.description: 保持对Slack频道的关注，需要您的注意力和时间！让Grok利用GPT-3的强大功能进行理解。让Grok利用GPT-3的强大功能进行理解。按需、在每日摘要中或在加入频道时对任何 Slack 频道进行总结。
保持對Slack頻道的關注，需要您的注意力和時間！讓Grok利用GPT-3的強大功能進行理解。讓Grok利用GPT-3的強大功能進行理解。按需、在每日摘要中或在加入頻道時對任何 Slack 頻道進行總結。

previous.excerpt: The way we build and use products is changing faster than ever before. To succeed, it’s essential to know what’s coming next. We surveyed thousands of Product leaders to distill the most important trends and insights you need to know as we enter 2021. Enjoy!
previous.title: Future of Product Management Report 2021 - This is the best time in history to build digital products🚀

localize.description: 我们构建和使用产品的方式比以往任何时候都要快。要想获得成功，就必须了解下一步的发展方向。我们调查了数千名产品领导者，提炼出进入2021年后您需要了解的最重要趋势和见解。请欣赏
localize.tagline: 这是历史上打造数字产品的最好时机🚀。

localize.description: 我們構建和使用產品的方式比以往任何時候都要快。要想獲得成功，就必須瞭解下一步的發展方向。我們調查了數千名產品領導者，提煉出進入2021年後您需要了解的最重要趨勢和見解。請欣賞
localize.tagline: 這是歷史上打造數字產品的最好時機🚀。

next.title: Wyndly - Train your immune system to beat your allergies
